Модули¶

Image segmentation.

segmentation.categories_from_txt(path: str) → list¶

Read categories from a file and return array.

segmentation.filter(output: dict) → list¶

Return objects with a probability >= 0.5.

segmentation.model_predictions(img: PIL.Image.Image) → dict¶

Return pretrained model predictions.

segmentation.segmentation(path: str) → PIL.Image.Image¶

Segment an image.

segmentation.segmented_image(img: numpy.ndarray, boxes: list, labels: list, scores: list) → PIL.Image.Image¶

Return a segmented image.

segmentation.torch2numpy(torch_dict: dict) → dict¶

Return a numpy dict from a torch dict.
